code: import*as actionTypes from"./types";/* User Actions */export var setUser=function setUser(user){return{type:actionTypes.SET_USER,payload:{currentUser:user}};};export var clearUser=function clearUser(){return{type:actionTypes.CLEAR_USER};};/* Channel Actions */export var setCurrentChannel=function setCurrentChannel(channel){return{type:actionTypes.SET_CURRENT_CHANNEL,payload:{currentChannel:channel}};};export var setPrivateChannel=function setPrivateChannel(isPrivateChannel){return{type:actionTypes.SET_PRIVATE_CHANNEL,payload:{isPrivateChannel:isPrivateChannel}};};export var setUserPosts=function setUserPosts(userPosts){return{type:actionTypes.SET_PRIVATE_POSTS,payload:{userPosts:userPosts}};};/ * Colors Action * /;export var setColors=function setColors(primaryColor,secondaryColor){return{type:actionTypes.SET_COLORS,payload:{primaryColor:primaryColor,secondaryColor:secondaryColor}};};
